channel.title: Posts on SnufflePuff
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SnufflePuff

item.title: String series: Part 1
item.description: String related problems used to scare the shit out of me. Then I was introduced to some string suffix structures and it absolutely blew my mind. I don't claim to be an expert on suffix structures, but I hope my approach to solve the following problems will help you get some insight. Please keep in mind that this article is in no way an introduction to these data structures. I'll attach some links at the end.
